name: Nether Puppet
description: Complete the mission "Grim Film of Finality" and clear Difficulty 02 for any phase of Apocalyptic Shadow to unlock the character Xueyi, 300 Stellar Jades, and 1 Self-Modeling Resin.
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
● Clear specific stages to obtain event rewards.

◆ Participation Requirement ◆
● Unlocked after completing the Adventure Mission "Grim Film of Finality."

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● Clear Difficulty 02 for any phase of Apocalyptic Shadow to obtain the 4-star character Xueyi (Destruction: Quantum), 300 Stellar Jades, and 1 Self-Modeling Resin.
